trans-unit.source: Represents authentication information in Authorization, ProxyAuthorization, WWW-Authenticate, and Proxy-Authenticate header values.
trans-unit.target: 代表授權、 ProxyAuthorization、 WWW 驗證和 Proxy 驗證標頭值中的驗證資訊。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationHeaderValue class provides support for the Authorization, ProxyAuthorization, WWW-Authenticate, and Proxy-Authenticate HTTP header values as defined in [RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=241642) by the IETF.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationHeaderValue 類別提供支援的授權、 ProxyAuthorization、 WWW 驗證和 Proxy 驗證的 HTTP 標頭值中所定義[RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=241642) IETF 根據。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The scheme to use for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於授權的配置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The scheme to use for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於授權的配置。

trans-unit.source: The credentials containing the authentication information of the user agent for the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: 包含所要求之資源的使用者代理程式的驗證資訊的認證。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref:System.Object>是否等於目前<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref:System.Object>等於目前的物件; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for an <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 做為雜湊函式<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A hash code is a numeric value that is used to identify an object during equality testing.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊程式碼是用來識別物件在等號比較測試期間的數值。

trans-unit.source: It can also serve as an index for an object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它也可做為集合中物件的索引。

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 方法適合用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the credentials containing the authentication information of the user agent for the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含所要求之資源的使用者代理程式的驗證資訊的認證。

trans-unit.source: The credentials containing the authentication information.
trans-unit.target: 包含驗證資訊的認證。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to an <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 將字串轉換成<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents authentication header value information.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表標頭值的驗證資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: input is a reference.
trans-unit.target: input是參考。

trans-unit.source: input is not valid authentication header value information.
trans-unit.target: input不是有效的驗證標頭值的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the scheme to use for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 取得要用於授權的配置。

trans-unit.source: The scheme to use for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於授權的配置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的物件目前的複本<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表目前<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a string is valid <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字串是否為有效<xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref>資訊。

trans-unit.source: The string to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"></xref> version of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue"> </xref>的字串版本。

trans-unit.source: if input is valid information; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if input is valid information; otherwise, .
